sentences: Alex de Grassi (born February 13, 1952) is an American fingerstyle guitarist.
Currently his primary touring/recording guitars are a custom Lowden F35c maple with a European spruce top and a custom Traugott R model Brazilian Rosewood with German spruce top.
Alex de Grassi's Interpretation of Simon & Garfunkel, (Northsound, 1997)
Alex de Grassi's Interpretation of James Taylor, (NorthSound, 1998)
